/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered here and there, adding depth to the vast expanse. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a warm glow. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in this part of the world, where nature and urban life coexist in harmony.
